newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin down three cents to 14.90 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin down three cents to 14.90 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell three cents to 14.90 ringgit ($5.95) a kg in tandem with Friday's fall on the London Metal Exchange (LME), dealers said.
"I think the market is following the LME again after a brief respite and climbing to the old support level of 15 ringgit (a kg)," said a local tin dealer.
Turnover fell to 50 tonnes from 97 on Friday. Bids totalled 49 tonnes against offers of 60. Buyers were from Japan and Malaysia. The premium against London rose to $55 a tonne from $35 previously.
